name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"No malicious memories"
On the fifth anniversary of Wuhan's lockdown, a lawyer posted: "It's been five years, I can't forget the suffering" but the post was deleted by the platform. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiEhvbPaIAA5be-.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Anhui CPPCC member Liu Tongzhu: The development of free blood donation in rural areas is lagging behind. We need to promote free blood donation to rural areas, increase free blood donation points, and increase publicity for blood donation.
Netizens replied "When will the welfare benefits be extended to rural areas?" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiEmS_8aUAAYpvC.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 24, Wang Yi had a phone call with US Secretary of State Rubio, advising him to "be on your own." Wang Yi said: "A major country should behave like a major country, shoulder its due international responsibilities, safeguard world peace, and help all countries achieve common development. I hope you will be on your own and play a constructive role for the future of the Chinese and American people and for world peace and stability." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiEqWjMbMAA6mqv.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Trump's threat to impose additional tariffs on goods from China has prompted many Canadian retailers to prepare to move their production lines to other places outside of China.
Andrew Lutfy, CEO of Groupe Dynamite, an apparel retailer: "We knew that the first quarter of this year would be a transformation, so we took some measures. We have taken measures to move more production lines out of China."
Shoemaker Steve Madden said it had previously planned to reduce Chinese-made goods by 10%, and now the goal is 40%.
Fashion sports brand Lululemon also told investors that the company's business in China is very limited.
Putting aside tariffs, another reason for moving away from China is the issue of forced labor. There is growing evidence that the human rights of Uyghurs in Xinjiang, China, are being violated, and Xinjiang is the production center of cotton and other goods...
fullContent:
特朗普威胁对来自中国的商品征收额外关税，令不少加拿大零售商准备将生产线转移到中国以外其他地方。
 服装零售业 Groupe Dynamite首席执行官卢特菲（Andrew Lutfy）：“我们知道今年第一季度将会转型，所以我们采取了一些措施，我们已经采取措施将更多的生产线迁出中国”
 制鞋商Steve Madden就表示，它之前计划将中国制造商品减少10%，现在的目标，是40%。
 时尚运动品牌 Lululemon 也告诉投资者，公司在中国的业务非常有限。
 而抛开关税不谈，另一个从中国转移的原因，是强迫劳动问题。越来越多证据表明，中国新疆维吾尔族人的人权受侵犯，而新疆是棉花和其他商品的生产中心。
 美国因此通过《维吾尔族强迫劳动保护法》，公司面临商品在边境被拦截、须证明不涉及强迫劳动的风险越来越高。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Douyin blogger Babos has posted more than 900 North Korean video clips, contributing months of general jokes, and attracted millions of fans in just a few months. Who would have thought that he would post a video of Tiananmen Square on January 1, with the caption: "The wheat has been ripe for 5,000 times, and Long Live the People is the first time." History calls it a dish of vinegar wrapped in 900 dumplings, and it has been ready for a long time to tell the audience where the real North Korea is. On January 24, Babos's Douyin account was banned, and some netizens joked that "Babos was invited to become a large-scale smoke tester in North Korea" "It has become an art, officially certified"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to Chuhai.com, recently, the China-Europe Railway Express containers departing from China via Russia to Europe have been subjected to comprehensive inspections by Russia. The inspections have led to a large backlog of containers. If prohibited items are found, the goods will be detained and confiscated, and the additional costs will be borne by the shipper.
In order to avoid Russian inspections, many foreign trade companies have turned to the southern channel "Trans-Caspian Transport Corridor", but this route has safety risks due to the Red Sea crisis. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiII7kFaAAAMKxh.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Foreign netizens asked on Xiaohongshu: Do Chinese high school students really stay in school until 9:30 p.m.?
A Chinese netizen replied that he had to do homework until the early morning in junior high school, and got up at 5:30 a.m. in high school and studied until 9:30 p.m. But he believes that these are worth it in order to make the country progress and prevent it from being invaded by foreign powers again. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiIMgo8bwAAMG63.jpg

Zhao Ce also worked with the director of the Wusan Police Station of the Hunnan Branch of the Shenyang Public Security Bureau, Arrest the informant. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1883090009068290048/pu/img/X2mWPiGN4xFOdbU7.jpg

content: On January 22, it was revealed online that on flight TK72 from Istanbul to Guangzhou, several Turkish passengers pushed the passengers sitting in the middle to the sides. A Chinese passenger said: "They came up and took seats directly, pushing the Chinese to the side, and no one dared to say anything." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1883095723731992576/pu/img/kKXRFY9akt_1WUL2.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 20, Beijing. The owner of an auto repair shop said that he was sued by a car company in Chongqing and received a subpoena from the Jiangbei District Court of Chongqing. He said that repairing domestic cars is a very dangerous thing. As long as you say something they don’t like to hear, you will be sued for millions of dollars in compensation, but no matter how you say Tesla’s shortcomings, the other party will not sue you. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1883100505116983296/pu/img/ph8u20n-gU4D3HQD.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 23, Jinan, Shandong. A man said that his wife was deceived by a qigong master to use qigong to treat cancer, and then she was admitted to the ICU due to liver and kidney failure, and the master was nowhere to be found.
The man said: "My wife has breast cancer, she doesn't believe in hospitals, but miracles. The master smeared chili water on her hands to "do qigong", which made people feel hot, and sold three-no drugs. My wife now has liver and kidney failure and is in a coma in the ICU. But the other party hid and could not be found. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1883105561425965056/pu/img/wtyVUdiQQlmqx3o1.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content:
After the recent revelation that the consistency evaluation data of generic drugs are identical, the outside world is currently unable to download the consistency evaluation data from the official website of the State Drug Administration.
Economic Observer: Is it the editor who made the mistake or someone else forged it? The Drug Administration still needs to respond to three questions
1: Why is the download permission for consistency evaluation data closed?
2: What is the process of collecting and uploading consistency evaluation data?
3: What are the original data of the three drugs? https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiIpyjWbEAAIFjf.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Reuters: Fast fashion e-commerce company Shein said that the company does not use Chinese cotton in its products sold to the United States. Shein submitted written evidence to the chairman of the British Parliamentary Committee, saying that the sources of cotton approved for use include Australia, Brazil, India, the United States, and "in limited circumstances" Europe, the Middle East and Africa, and certain countries in Southeast Asia, excluding China. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiIsbhVbgAAvshB.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 23 (Released) Henan. A farmer posted a video complaining about the difficulty of farming: I heard some time ago that a colleague in Inner Mongolia committed suicide because he couldn't hold on. It feels like it's been very difficult in recent years. I lose money no matter what I raise. I don't know where the problem lies. I've suffered a lot but I just don't make any money. Is it because I'm not working hard enough? https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1883119971770961921/pu/img/4QobzWZTLoxX0-A3.jpg

content: On January 25, news broke that the father of Hunan human rights lawyer Xie Yang passed away. Xie Yang was not allowed to see him for the last time in prison. … https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiIz_qRaQAA6yBo.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many people in Heze, Shandong reported that the water quality was polluted. After testing with instruments, the tap water values were seriously exceeded.
Local people said that the tap water was turbid and had a slight odor. "It tasted salty and astringent, fake and slippery." Those who had the conditions bought water purifiers to solve the water problem, while those who did not had to endure and continue to drink tap water. They complained to the relevant departments many times but there was no improvement. The matter was uploaded to the Internet and deleted by the platform.
Heze Water Affairs Bureau: The water quality in the urban area is safe and qualified. The water leaving the factory every day will undergo 95 tests.
Heze Municipal Government Office: We have received complaints and are arranging and deploying to deal with water quality issues.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Truck driver Lu drove alone to deliver goods from Suqian to Guiyang, a total distance of 1,710 kilometers. The express company required him to deliver the goods within 27 hours and 40 minutes, and he would be charged for overtime. Official regulations require that truck drivers must take a 20-minute break every 4 hours of driving. However, the driver stopped to eat for more than 10 minutes, and the express company called to urge him to go faster. In the end, it took 27 hours and 20 minutes to deliver the goods. The driver got up at 8 am on the first day and arrived in Guiyang at 2:40 am on the third day. He only slept for one hour in the entire 48-hour journey.

Local residents set off fireworks and hung banners to celebrate. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1883144823492005888/pu/img/kcs7aEqOGTOXsP9n.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 23, Gansu. A little girl was born with an eye disease. Her mother said that the child needed to replace her cornea, and one eye would cost 450,000 yuan, and both eyes would need to be replaced. Currently, the child has light perception, but cannot see the words on the books clearly. The mother wanted to replace her cornea, but the doctor said it was not a match.
The little girl said that if she could see, she would like to go to the city to have a look. A kind woman gave some clothes to the little girl and her family. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1883159868112355328/pu/img/3hFozdiO3otrkQUs.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It was revealed online that Chen Zhuokai, a graduate student in the Urology Department of the Fifth Hospital of Sun Yat-sen University, committed suicide in his rental house on the evening of January 20 because he could not bear the bullying and suppression of his anesthesiology teacher.
His father questioned why the hospital did not contact the child for a whole day after the child's death. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiJbh7pagAA0-m7.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs: In the first three quarters of 2024, the per capita disposable income of farmers in poverty-stricken counties was 12,384 yuan, an increase of 6.5% over the same period last year; grain production was another bumper harvest, reaching a new level of 1.4 trillion jin for the first time.
A farmer from Liaoning said: That is a pure lie and exaggeration. It is obvious how difficult the lives of ordinary people have been in recent years. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1883171447251857408/pu/img/jF32GsC_rHR5cS3l.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In an interview with Fox News, Trump said: Zelensky is not an angel either, he shouldn't let the war happen... If it were me, I could make a deal, but Zelensky chose to fight.
Although Trump acknowledged that Ukraine was brave in resisting Russia, he also blamed Zelensky for choosing to fight an obviously much stronger enemy instead of reaching an agreement.
Trump said, "I could have easily made that deal, and Zelensky decided 'I want to fight'", and then compared the number of tanks owned by the two countries, emphasizing that the Russian army has more tanks, "You won't fight these." Trump also said, "We are starting to invest in equipment," and Ukraine "has the courage to use these equipment, but in the final analysis, this is a war that must be resolved."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 22, Yangxi County, Guangdong. The Lugang Group Yucai Primary School project owed workers wages. The workers built the school but could not get their wages, so they jumped off the building to demand their wages.
January 22, Sichuan. Construction workers sat on the roof and jumped off the building to demand their wages.
January 22, Jiangxi. Construction workers sat on the roof to demand their wages, and the police were there to maintain stability.
January 22, Guangdong. Workers demanded their wages at the gate of China Resources Bank. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1883182269021794304/pu/img/sl7MG-otA_GQO29j.jpg
